title: Submit a Bid for a Government Contract
description: A registered vendor is submitting a bid for a public works contract.

tasks.description: Identify the vendor and the specific contract they are bidding on.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the vendor's profile and the open contract.

tasks.description: Verify that all required bidding documents have been uploaded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the bid package is complete.

tasks.description: Accept and timestamp the bid submission before the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the bid as received on time.
